1.title: The Wolf and the Leopard
1.plot: Mina goes to the jungle and sees a group of wolves that are attacking an injured Leopard cub. She wants to run away but returns to the scene and helps the cub, and later runs back to the village but the cub follows her.

2.title: Horse and the Leopard
2.plot: Sheriff asks Mina to let go of the Leopard because of the livestock in the village, she can not do it and later he promises to give her a horse in return but.

3.title: The Suitor Comes
3.plot: A very wealthy man from another village comes to their village and asks Mina to marry him, These two villages have history and they had a lot of fights in the past, This will change the past and people know that they can have access to a lot of a new things, But Mina does not like the guy.

4.title: The Stubborn Girl
4.plot: Mina does not like the boy and does not want to marry him, to her he is a spoiled kid from a rich family and she hates that type of people, everyone asks her to marry but she says NO.

5.title: Everyone VS Mina
5.plot: Everyone in the village pushes Mina to reconsider and marry the rich boy, but she believes its her very right to say no and decide about her own life and her own future. The people of the village get very upset and they tell her that she will regret this very soon.

6.title: Prey on Livestock
6.plot: Sheep and livestock get attacked at nights, Angry villagers believes that Mina's cub, now a grown Leopard attacks them and they capture the Leopard.

7.title: Your Pet Is the Pest
7.plot: Three of the villagers say that all of their investigations lead to one thing, that Mina's Leopard has been attacking the animals at nights. Mina can not let them kill her beloved pet but she is powerless to do anything. The villagers capture the Leopard to kill him next morning.

8.title: The Darkest Surise
8.plot: Villagers drag the Leopard to the square and they are preparing to kill him in a medieval way. Mina is sitting in her room and crying, she can not go... At the last minute a man comes and tells everyone that one of his sheep has been killed last night when Leopard was captive. After that, one of the villagers that has been extremely annoyed with Mina's decision to not get married tells everyone that he saw a Bear !

9.title: Salvation
9.plot: Leopard runs to Mina's house, She can not believe that he is alive. The villagers get ready and go the jungle to hunt for the bear.

10.title: The Attack
10.plot: All men in the village go to the jungle to hunt the bear, only women and children are left in the village. What they don't know is that the bear was inside a barn the whole time and he comes out, Mina loves animals and does not want hurt the bear, after a long chase and with the help of Leopard she is able to control the bear and tie him without hurting him.

11.title: Dilema
11.plot: Villagers have been hiding in their houses and they don't know that Mina has captured the bear, she knows that if they find out they will kill the bear for sure, She takes the bear to the other side of the river and comes back, she tells everyone that the bear fell into the river and won't come back.

12.title: The Plague
12.plot: A large number of people get sick in the village and they feel like the village is cursed. Leopard and the dogs in the village don't drink the water and Mina understands that it could be because of the water.

13.title: Wisdom vs Superstition
13.plot: People of the village believe that they have been cursed and they want to sacrifice a number of their animals. Mina stops them and goes to town to make sure what is really going on.

14.title: We Buy Your Lands
14.plot: While Mina was gone two men come to the village to buy some lands, they say we wanted to buy it but not that the village has been cursed they don't wanna buy the lands. Villagers want to sell their lands for cheap, they believe they really have been cursed. Mina returns from the city, she knows that the water has been poisoned !

15.title: Poison
15.plot: Mina tells everyone that the water has been poisoned, People don't believe her and say these gentlemen who came from the city say and believe that they have been cursed and they are willing to buy their lands. Mina asks them to drink the water, it its a curse and not a poison they should drink it, They don't drink, and people seize them.

16.title: Gold Mine
16.plot: Two men confess that there is a gold mine in this village and they were trying to buy all the lands from them, Mina turns into the hero of the village.

17.title: City Obsession
17.plot: Mina is obsessed with what she saw in the city, she wants to become a doctor and come back to the village to save lives and not let anything like the water poisoning happen again, but she can not leave the Leopard. Her father talks to her and asks her to take the Leopard to the jungle, to the place that he really belongs.

18.title: The Last Goodbye
18.plot: Mina takes the Leopard to the jungle and says goodbye to him, she says good bye to her father and leaves the village for the city.

-1.title: The Attack
-1.plot: All men in the village go to the jungle to hunt the bear, only women and children are left in the village. What they don't know is that the bear was inside a barn the whole time and he comes out, Mina loves animals and does not want hurt the bear, after a long chase and with the help of Leopard she is able to control the bear and tie him without hurting him.
